description:
After an usual combats between Koi Koi Seven, Miya the Queen declares that she is the owner of this island and it is true. Miya demands Koi Koi Seven to get out immediately.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nankoku Tenkoku! Zenra de Tatakae! Kessenjou wa Tora Tora Tora Desu
Tropical Paradise! Fight in the Nude! The Final Battlefield Is Tora Tora Tora
南国天国! 全裸で戦え! 決戦場はトラトラトラです~
